TITLE: Ticket
CREATE_EMBED_DESC: Color for the embed when a ticket is created
CLOSE_EMBED_DESC: Color for the embed when a ticket is closed
LIMIT_DESC: Maximum amount of tickets in the server at once
STAFF_ROLE_DESC: Roles that can manage tickets in this category
MEM_ROLE_DESC: Roles that can create tickets in this category
EMBED_TITLE_DESC: Title for the embed when a ticket is created
EMBED_DESC_DESC: Description for the embed when a ticket is created
EMBED_FOOTER_DESC: Footer for the embed when a ticket is created
DELETE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete this category?
